traits.name: Amorphous
entries: The plasmoid can squeeze through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide, provided it is wearing and carrying nothing. It has advantage on ability checks it makes to initiate or escape a grapple.

traits.name: Hold Breath
entries: The plasmoid can hold its breath for 1 hour.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The plasmoid makes three Pseudopod attacks.

actions.name: Pseudopod
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit (with advantage if the plasmoid has one or more allies within 10 feet of itself), reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage.
